issue.message: Must be one or more of: PackageManager.GET_META_DATA, PackageManager.GET_SHARED_LIBRARY_FILES, PackageManager.MATCH_UNINSTALLED_PACKAGES, PackageManager.MATCH_SYSTEM_ONLY, PackageManager.MATCH_DISABLED_COMPONENTS, PackageManager.MATCH_DISABLED_UNTIL_USED_COMPONENTS, PackageManager.GET_DISABLED_UNTIL_USED_COMPONENTS, PackageManager.GET_UNINSTALLED_PACKAGES, PackageManager.MATCH_APEX
